simplifiedChinese.title: Council at Jerusalem
simplifiedChinese.Question1: What issue did the apostles and elders gather in Jerusalem to consider?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: According to Peter in this story how are believers saved?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: Do you feel the need to fulfill certain religious expectations to be saved?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: Just as the Holy Spirit confirmed the truth of the gospel to apostles and elders, what is the Holy Spirit saying to you?
